select
,ser.name as service_name,ser."user" as service_user,clu.root_dir,c.component_name,c.command_script,hst.hostname, hst.grpc_port from host_component hc inner join host hst on hc.host_id = hst.id inner join component c on hc.component_id = c.id inner join cluster clu on c.cluster_id = clu.id inner join service ser on c.service_id=ser.id and c.cluster_id = ser.cluster_id
